description:
（泰勒·斯威夫特2013CMT现场表演《RED》）

Let's give it up for country music, y'all! The 2013 CMT Music Awards were held in Nashville tonight, honoring videos by country's most popular crooners while also giving fans a chance to see their favorite stars perform live. For starters, it looks like Blake Shelton's "good luck" tweet to his wife Miranda Lambert worked, because the star's pair of awards made her the night's most winning solo artist. Duo Florida Georgia Line also took home two trophies.

娱乐快讯：让我们为乡村音乐鼓掌喝彩吧！2013年乡村音乐电视奖今晚（美国当地时间）在纳什维尔举办，不仅可以看到最受欢迎歌手们的音乐录影带，还给粉丝们机会看喜欢的明星现场表演。首先，看上去布莱克·谢尔顿对妻子米兰达·兰伯特发推“祝好运”的消息奏效了，因为这位明星今晚获得了两个奖杯。谢尔顿的《Sure Be Cool If You Did》被评为了“年度最佳男歌手录影带”。

获奖名单：
年度最佳录影带 Video of the Year: Carrie Underwood, "Blown Away"
年度最佳男歌手录影带 Male Video of the Year: Blake Shelton, "Sure Be Cool If You Did""
年度最佳女歌手录影带 Female Video of the Year: Miranda Lambert, "Mama's Broken Heart"
年度最佳组合录影带 Group Video of the Year: Lady Antebellum, "Downtown"
年度最佳二人组录影带 Duo Video of the Year: Florida Georgia Line, "Cruise"
年度最具突破录影带 Breakthrough Video of the Year: Florida Georgia Line, "Cruise"
年度最佳合作录影带 Collaborative Video of the Year: Jason Aldean with Luke Bryan and Eric Church, "The Only Way I Know"
CMT年度最佳表演 CMT Performance of the Year: Miranda Lambert, "Over You"
